34 -def _make_norm_enc(): 

35      """ Make encoding normalizer """ 
36      isinstance_, unicode_, str_ = isinstance, unicode, str 
37      normalize = _encodings.normalize_encoding 
38      aliases = _encodings.aliases.aliases.get 
39      get_alias = lambda x: aliases(x, x) 
40   
41      def norm_enc(encoding): # pylint: disable = W0621 
42          """ Return normalized unaliased encoding name """ 
43          if not isinstance_(encoding, unicode_): 
44              encoding = str_(encoding).decode('latin-1') 
45          return get_alias(normalize(encoding.lower())) 

46   
47      return norm_enc 
48   
49  norm_enc = _make_norm_enc()
